Constructor Detail

IcmpSocketX

public IcmpSocketX()
create a raw ICMP socket to send out raw udp packets as well as sniff icmp packets reaching machine.

IcmpSocketX

public IcmpSocketX(IPHeader iph,
                   ICMPHeader icmph)
Create a ICMP socket with preset values. Can be used to send raw packets as well

Parameters:
iph - The IP header
icmph - The ICMP header
Method Detail

send a fully defined packet

Parameters:

Returns:

sendData

public int sendData(Data data)
Send data for a icmp socket with preset values

Parameters:
data - data to send, Are ip header and icmp header defined? dangerous
Returns:
send status(0 for success)

getIcmpPacket

public IcmpPacket getIcmpPacket()
Return any icmp packet that reaches machine, blocking call Used for sniffing network.

Returns:
a ICMP packet captured

getReplyIcmpPacket

public IcmpPacket getReplyIcmpPacket()
To be called only when initialised with the predefined values. Used to listen for an expected reply packet is response to the previously sent packet. blocking call, cannot be called from main thread in android, see asynctask for more details

Returns:
a icmp packet with corresponding headers

isPreset

public boolean isPreset()
tells whether ipv4 header and and icmp header is initialized and sendData and getReplyPaket function can be used safely.

Returns:
true if properly setup with right values

public IPHeader getPresetIpHeader()
